paper_abstract: THIS ARTICLE CONSIDERS AN EMBEDDED VIRTUALIZATION PLATFORM DESIGN FOR A BRING YOUR OWN DEVICE (BYOD) SCENARIO, IN WHICH A COMPANY'S PRIVILEGED INFORMATION MUST BE ISOLATED FROM UNAUTHORIZED EMPLOYEE ACCESS. THE AUTHORS PROPOSE THE VNATIVE ARCHITECTURE DESIGN FOR COMPLETE ISOLATION AMONG DIFFERENT USAGE SCENARIOS. VNATIVE IS SUITABLE FOR BYOD TO FREEZE OTHER UNAUTHENTIC APPLICATIONS AND IS CONSISTENT WITH THE POWER CONSUMPTION AND LIMITED DISPLAY SIZE OF MOBILE DEVICES.
paper_title: A VIRTUALIZATION SOLUTION FOR BYOD WITH DYNAMIC PLATFORM CONTEXT SWITCHING
